Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

HSAMPLE

The basic type HSAMPLE is a handle to a digital sound sample.

Discussion

HSAMPLE handles are returned from the AIL_allocate_sample_handle function.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AILSAMPLECB, AIL_allocate_file_sample, AIL_allocate_sample_handle, AIL_end_sample, AIL_filter_sample_attribute, AIL_get_DirectSound_info, AIL_init_sample, AIL_load_sample_buffer, AIL_register_EOB_callback, AIL_register_EOF_callback, AIL_register_EOS_callback, AIL_register_SOB_callback, AIL_release_sample_handle, AIL_resume_sample, AIL_sample_buffer_info, AIL_sample_buffer_ready, AIL_sample_granularity, AIL_sample_loop_count, AIL_sample_ms_position, AIL_sample_pan, AIL_sample_playback_rate, AIL_sample_position, AIL_sample_reverb, AIL_sample_status, AIL_sample_user_data, AIL_sample_volume, AIL_set_filter_sample_preference, AIL_set_named_sample_file, AIL_set_sample_address, AIL_set_sample_adpcm_block_size, AIL_set_sample_file, AIL_set_sample_loop_block, AIL_set_sample_loop_count, AIL_set_sample_ms_position, AIL_set_sample_pan, AIL_set_sample_playback_rate, AIL_set_sample_position, AIL_set_sample_processor, AIL_set_sample_reverb, AIL_set_sample_type, AIL_set_sample_user_data, AIL_set_sample_volume, AIL_start_sample, AIL_stop_sample
